docs.lead_paragraph: The talk of Britain this past weekend was whether or not a 13-year-old boy named Alfie is the father of a one-week-old baby girl. Alfie and Chantelle, the 15-year-old mother, say the baby is his, but two other teenagers have been stepping forward to say that they, too, had sex with the girl around the time that the child was conceived.
docs.abstract: You know what you have to do. But how to begin? The good news is that you have something your parents did not - the Internet.
docs.snippet: You know what you have to do. But how to begin? The good news is that you have something your parents did not - the Internet.

docs.lead_paragraph: Bristol Palin, Gov. Sarah Palin's 18-year-old daughter, sat for her first interview since giving birth to Tripp, which aired Monday on Fox News Channel's "On the Record with Greta Van Susteren."
docs.abstract: Bristol Palin appeared on television for the first time since giving birth in December and said that abstinence is "not realistic."
docs.snippet: Bristol Palin appeared on television for the first time since giving birth in December and said that abstinence is "not realistic."

docs.lead_paragraph: The death of Brandon McClelland has reignited racial issues that have plagued Paris, Tex., for generations.
